ing: 2 tablespoons matzo meal, or as needed
des: "I have been making this charoset since my first Passover. Even the kids love it!"
ins: Blend apples, bananas, dates, walnuts, orange zest and juice, lemon zest and juice, cinnamon, and sugar in a food processor until chunky. Transfer apple mixture to a bowl and stir in wine. Gradually stir matzo meal into apple mixture, adding enough to soak up the wine; chill in refrigerator.
